Package xstampp.ui.editors.commands

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BulletListHandler
    this Handler adds a Bullet List to a selection of text this is done by calling ITextEditor.setBullet(String) with the value of the parameter xstampp.commandParameter.bulletlist
    ColorChooseHandle
    this Handler changes either the ITextEditor.FOREGROUND or the ITextEditor.BACKGROUND this is done by calling ITextEditor.setStyleColor(String, RGB) with the value of the parameters xstampp.commandParameter.color.type xstampp.commandParameter.color.red xstampp.commandParameter.color.green xstampp.commandParameter.color.blue
    FontChooserHandle
    this Handler changes the current Font of a text editor this is done by calling ITextEditor.setFont(String, int) with the value of the parameters xstampp.commandParameter.fontfamily xstampp.commandParameter.fontsize
    StyleHandler
    this Handler changes the current Style of the text which is either written or selected in a text editor this is done by calling ITextEditor.setStyle(String) with the value of the parameter xstampp.commandParameter.style
    TextBaselineHandler
    this Handler changes the current Sty√∂e of the text which is either written or selected in a text editor this is done by calling ITextEditor.setStyle(String) with the value of the parameter xstampp.commandParameter.baseline TODO this is not the normal increase/decrease Baseline function since it sets the whole selection to one level
    instead of setting the baseline
